name: Hashirama Senju
description: The First Hokage and founder of Konohagakure, known as the 'God of Shinobi'.

name: Tobirama Senju
description: The Second Hokage, known for his mastery of Water Release and the creation of many powerful techniques.

name: Hiruzen Sarutobi
description: The Third Hokage, known as the 'Professor' for his mastery of all ninja techniques.

name: Minato Namikaze
description: The Fourth Hokage, known as the 'Yellow Flash' for his incredible speed and mastery of the Flying Thunder God Technique.

name: Tsunade
description: The Fifth Hokage and one of the Legendary Sannin, known for her medical ninjutsu and immense strength.

name: Kakashi Hatake
description: The Copy Ninja, known for his Sharingan and mastery of over a thousand techniques.

name: Naruto Uzumaki
description: The Seventh Hokage and jinchūriki of Kurama, known for his determination and mastery of the Shadow Clone Technique.

name: Naruto Uzumaki (Baryon Mode)
description: Naruto's ultimate form, achieved by combining Kurama's chakra with his own life force.

name: Naruto Uzumaki (Next Generations)
description: The Seventh Hokage and jinchūriki of Kurama, known for his determination and mastery of the Shadow Clone Technique.

name: Sasuke Uchiha
description: A prodigy of the Uchiha clan, seeking redemption and power to protect the village.

name: Sasuke Uchiha (Next Generations)
description: A prodigy of the Uchiha clan, seeking redemption and power to protect the village.

name: Sakura Haruno
description: A skilled kunoichi with immense strength and medical ninjutsu abilities.

name: Sakura Uchiha (Next Generations)
description: A skilled kunoichi with immense strength and medical ninjutsu abilities.

name: Kakashi Hatake (Next Generations)
description: The Sixth Hokage, a legendary ninja with the Sharingan and mastery of the Lightning Blade.

name: Konohamaru Sarutobi (Next Generations)
description: The grandson of the Third Hokage, striving to become a strong ninja and protect his village.

name: Shikamaru Nara
description: A tactical genius with the ability to manipulate shadows, known for his laziness and intelligence.

name: Shikamaru Nara (Next Generations)
description: A tactical genius with the ability to manipulate shadows, known for his laziness and intelligence.

name: Chōji Akimichi
description: A member of Team Asuma, known for his immense strength and ability to expand his body.

name: Chōji Akimichi (Next Generations)
description: A member of Team Asuma, known for his immense strength and ability to expand his body.

name: Ino Yamanaka
description: A member of Team Asuma, known for her mind transfer techniques and her rivalry with Sakura.

name: Ino Yamanaka (Next Generations)
description: A member of Team Asuma, known for her mind transfer techniques and her rivalry with Sakura.

name: Sai Yamanaka
description: A member of Team Kakashi, known for his artistic ninjutsu and calm demeanor.

name: Sai Yamanaka (Next Generations)
description: A member of Team Kakashi, known for his artistic ninjutsu and calm demeanor.

name: Rock Lee
description: A taijutsu specialist who overcomes his lack of ninjutsu with incredible determination and hard work.

name: Rock Lee (Next Generations)
description: A taijutsu specialist who overcomes his lack of ninjutsu with incredible determination and hard work.

name: Tenten (Next Generations)
description: A weapons specialist with a vast arsenal of ninja tools and a dream to become a legendary kunoichi.

name: Shino Aburame (Next Generations)
description: A quiet and analytical ninja who uses insects to fight and gather information.

name: Hinata Hyūga
description: A gentle kunoichi with the Byakugan, known for her love for Naruto and her growth as a ninja.

name: Hinata Uzumaki (Next Generations)
description: A gentle kunoichi with the Byakugan, known for her love for Naruto and her growth as a ninja.

name: Sarada Uchiha
description: The daughter of Sasuke and Sakura, aspiring to become Hokage and master the Sharingan.

name: Boruto Uzumaki
description: The son of Naruto Uzumaki, a prodigy with the Jougan and a desire to carve his own path.

name: Mitsuki
description: A synthetic human created by Orochimaru, possessing the Sage Transformation ability.

name: Mitsuki (Post Sage Mode)
description: Mitsuki after mastering Sage Mode, showcasing enhanced abilities and strength.

name: Mitsuki (Sage Mode)
description: A powerful transformation that enhances the user's physical abilities and sensory perception.

name: Kawaki
description: A vessel for Karma and a key figure in the battle against the Ōtsutsuki clan.

name: Isshiki Ōtsutsuki
description: A powerful member of the Ōtsutsuki clan with god-like abilities and a desire to harvest the chakra fruit.

name: Madara Uchiha
description: A legendary Uchiha who sought to create a world of infinite Tsukuyomi, possessing immense power.

name: Obito Uchiha
description: A former student of Minato, who became the masked man behind much of the series' conflict.

name: Itachi Uchiha
description: A prodigy of the Uchiha clan, known for his sacrifice and mastery of the Sharingan.

name: Jiraiya
description: One of the Legendary Sannin, a master of ninjutsu and mentor to Naruto Uzumaki.

name: Orochimaru
description: One of the Legendary Sannin, a rogue ninja obsessed with immortality and mastering all ninjutsu.

name: Kabuto Yakushi
description: A former spy and disciple of Orochimaru, known for his medical ninjutsu and Sage Transformation.

name: Deidara
description: A rogue ninja and member of the Akatsuki, specializing in explosive clay techniques.

name: Konan
description: A member of the Akatsuki, known for her paper-based ninjutsu and loyalty to Nagato.

name: Pain
description: The leader of the Akatsuki, possessing the Rinnegan and the ability to control multiple bodies.

name: Kisame Hoshigaki
description: A member of the Akatsuki, known as the 'Monster of the Hidden Mist' for his shark-like abilities.

name: Zabuza Momochi
description: The Demon of the Hidden Mist, a master of silent killing and wielder of the Kubikiribōchō.

name: Haku
description: A skilled ice-style user and loyal companion to Zabuza Momochi.

name: Gaara
description: The Fifth Kazekage, once a jinchūriki of Shukaku, now a protector of his village.

name: Gaara (Next Generations)
description: The Fifth Kazekage, once a jinchūriki of Shukaku, now a protector of his village.

name: Killer Bee
description: The jinchūriki of the Eight-Tails and a master of the unique Eight-Tails style of combat.

name: Ōnoki
description: The Third Tsuchikage, known for his mastery of Earth Release and Particle Style techniques.

name: Yamato
description: A ninja with the ability to use Wood Release, tasked with keeping Naruto's Nine-Tails chakra in check.
